title: Smart Data models - cemeteryNiche schema
description: Data regarding individual niches and graves in cemeteries and graveyards.

height.description: Property. Number of cemetery units over the ground — the floor on a certain niche wall — in which the niche is located. Counted up from 0 (ground level i.e. interment). Units: 'n/a'

number.description: Property. Reference number for the plot. Format dependent on cemetery management.  Units:'n/a'

refDepartment.description: Relationship. Reference to the entity representing the particular deparment (type: cemeteryDepartment) in which the niche is located
